sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useEffect, useRef } from "react" const AREA_MAXIMA = 50 const CANVAS_WIDTH = 1000 const CANVAS_HEIGHT = 700 const DistributionCanvas = ({ distribucion }) => { const canvasRef = useRef(null) useEffect(() => { if (!canvasRef.current || !distribucion) return const canvas = canvasRef.current const ctx = canvas.getContext("2d") const bgGradient = ctx.createRadialGradient( CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, CANVAS_HEIGHT / 2, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, CANVAS_HEIGHT / 2, CANVAS_WIDTH * 0.8, ) bgGradient.addColorStop(0, "#1a1f2e") bgGradient.addColorStop(0.5, "#151a26") bgGradient.addColorStop(1, "#0f1419") ctx.fillStyle = bgGradient ctx.fillRect(0, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH, CANVAS_HEIGHT) ctx.strokeStyle = "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08)" ctx.lineWidth = 1 const gridSize = 50 for (let x = 0; x <= CANVAS_WIDTH; x += gridSize) { ctx.globalAlpha = x % (gridSize * 2) === 0 ? 0.15 : 0.08 ctx.beginPath() ctx.moveTo(x, 0) ctx.lineTo(x, CANVAS_HEIGHT) ctx.stroke() } for (let y = 0; y <= CANVAS_HEIGHT; y += gridSize) { ctx.globalAlpha = y % (gridSize * 2) === 0 ? 0.15 : 0.08 ctx.beginPath() ctx.moveTo(0, y) ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH, y) ctx.stroke() } ctx.globalAlpha = 1 ctx.strokeStyle = "rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.5)" ctx.lineWidth = 4 ctx.strokeRect(0, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH, CANVAS_HEIGHT) const colores = [ { fill: "#667eea", shadow: "#4c63d2", light: "#8b9aff", glow: "rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.6)" }, { fill: "#12b886", shadow: "#0ca678", light: "#38d9a9", glow: "rgba(18, 184, 134, 0.6)" }, { fill: "#fab005", shadow: "#e09f04", light: "#fcc419", glow: "rgba(250, 176, 5, 0.6)" }, { fill: "#fa5252", shadow: "#e03e3e", light: "#ff6b6b", glow: "rgba(250, 82, 82, 0.6)" }, { fill: "#228be6", shadow: "#1c7ed6", light: "#4dabf7", glow: "rgba(34, 139, 230, 0.6)" }, { fill: "#be4bdb", shadow: "#ae3ec9", light: "#da77f2", glow: "rgba(190, 75, 219, 0.6)" }, { fill: "#20c997", shadow: "#1bb386", light: "#63e6be", glow: "rgba(32, 201, 151, 0.6)" }, { fill: "#fd7e14", shadow: "#e8590c", light: "#ff922b", glow: "rgba(253, 126, 20, 0.6)" }, { fill: "#4c6ef5", shadow: "#3b5bdb", light: "#748ffc", glow: "rgba(76, 110, 245, 0.6)" }, { fill: "#82c91e", shadow: "#74b816", light: "#a9e34b", glow: "rgba(130, 201, 30, 0.6)" }, { fill: "#15aabf", shadow: "#1098ad", light: "#3bc9db", glow: "rgba(21, 170, 191, 0.6)" }, { fill: "#e64980", shadow: "#d6336c", light: "#f06595", glow: "rgba(230, 73, 128, 0.6)" }, ] const escala = Math.sqrt((CANVAS_WIDTH * CANVAS_HEIGHT) / AREA_MAXIMA) * 0.82 let x = 40 let y = 100 let maxHeightInRow = 0 distribucion.forEach((item, index) => { const areaUnitaria = item.area const cantidad = item.cantidad const colorSet = colores[index % colores.length] for (let i = 0; i < cantidad; i++) { const lado = Math.sqrt(areaUnitaria) * escala if (x + lado > CANVAS_WIDTH - 40) { x = 40 y += maxHeightInRow + 20 maxHeightInRow = 0 } if (y + lado > CANVAS_HEIGHT - 40) { break } ctx.shadowColor = colorSet.glow ctx.shadowBlur = 30 ctx.shadowOffsetX = 0 ctx.shadowOffsetY = 0 const radius = Math.min(lado * 0.15, 18) const internalGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(x, y, x + lado, y + lado) internalGradient.addColorStop(0, colorSet.light) internalGradient.addColorStop(0.4, colorSet.fill) internalGradient.addColorStop(1, colorSet.shadow) ctx.fillStyle = internalGradient ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(x, y, lado, lado, radius) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)" ctx.shadowBlur = 15 ctx.shadowOffsetX = 4 ctx.shadowOffsetY = 4 ctx.fillStyle = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)" ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(x + 3, y + 3, lado - 6, lado - 6, radius - 2) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.strokeStyle = "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)" ctx.lineWidth = 3 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(x, y, lado, lado, radius) ctx.stroke() const highlightGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(x, y, x, y + lado * 0.4) highlightGradient.addColorStop(0, "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)") highlightGradient.addColorStop(1, "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)") ctx.fillStyle = highlightGradient ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(x, y, lado, lado * 0.4, [radius, radius, 0, 0]) ctx.fill() if (lado > 60) { ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.font = "bold 17px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "center" ctx.textBaseline = "middle" const texto = item.nombre.length > 15 ? item.nombre.substring(0, 12) + "..." : item.nombre ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9)" ctx.shadowBlur = 10 ctx.shadowOffsetX = 2 ctx.shadowOffsetY = 2 ctx.fillText(texto, x + lado / 2, y + lado / 2 - 14) ctx.font = "600 14px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.fillStyle = "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)" ctx.fillText(`${areaUnitaria.toFixed(2)} m²`, x + lado / 2, y + lado / 2 + 10) ctx.font = "bold 12px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.fillStyle = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)" ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(x + lado - 32, y + 8, 24, 20, 6) ctx.fill() ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.shadowBlur = 4 ctx.fillText(`#${i + 1}`, x + lado - 20, y + 18) ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 } else if (lado > 35) { ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.font = "bold 20px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "center" ctx.textBaseline = "middle" ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9)" ctx.shadowBlur = 8 ctx.fillText(item.nombre.charAt(0), x + lado / 2, y + lado / 2) ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 } x += lado + 20 maxHeightInRow = Math.max(maxHeightInRow, lado) } }) const legendX = 40 const legendY = CANVAS_HEIGHT - 50 - distribucion.length * 38 const legendWidth = 340 ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)" ctx.shadowBlur = 40 ctx.shadowOffsetX = 0 ctx.shadowOffsetY = 10 const legendGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient( legendX - 20, legendY - 20, legendX - 20, legendY + distribucion.length * 38 + 40, ) legendGradient.addColorStop(0, "rgba(30, 35, 50, 0.95)") legendGradient.addColorStop(1, "rgba(20, 25, 40, 0.98)") ctx.fillStyle = legendGradient ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(legendX - 20, legendY - 20, legendWidth, distribucion.length * 38 + 40, 16) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.strokeStyle = "rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.4)" ctx.lineWidth = 2 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(legendX - 20, legendY - 20, legendWidth, distribucion.length * 38 + 40, 16) ctx.stroke() distribucion.forEach((item, index) => { const colorSet = colores[index % colores.length] ctx.shadowColor = colorSet.glow ctx.shadowBlur = 15 const itemGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient( legendX, legendY + index * 38, legendX + 28, legendY + index * 38 + 28, ) itemGradient.addColorStop(0, colorSet.light) itemGradient.addColorStop(0.5, colorSet.fill) itemGradient.addColorStop(1, colorSet.shadow) ctx.fillStyle = itemGradient ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(legendX, legendY + index * 38, 28, 28, 7) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.strokeStyle = "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)" ctx.lineWidth = 2 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(legendX, legendY + index * 38, 28, 28, 7) ctx.stroke() ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.font = "600 15px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "left" ctx.fillText(`${item.nombre}`, legendX + 42, legendY + index * 38 + 15) const cantidadText = `× ${item.cantidad}` const cantidadWidth = ctx.measureText(cantidadText).width + 14 ctx.fillStyle = colorSet.fill ctx.shadowColor = colorSet.glow ctx.shadowBlur = 10 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect( legendX + 42 + ctx.measureText(item.nombre).width + 12, legendY + index * 38 + 4, cantidadWidth, 22, 11, ) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.font = "bold 12px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "center" ctx.fillText( cantidadText, legendX + 42 + ctx.measureText(item.nombre).width + 12 + cantidadWidth / 2, legendY + index * 38 + 15, ) }) ctx.fillStyle = "rgba(30, 35, 50, 0.95)" ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)" ctx.shadowBlur = 30 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 - 220, 20, 440, 60, 14) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.strokeStyle = "rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.5)" ctx.lineWidth = 2 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 - 220, 20, 440, 60, 14) ctx.stroke() ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.font = "bold 20px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "center" ctx.fillText("Distribución Óptima de Artículos", CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, 42) const areaTotal = distribucion.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.areaTotal, 0).toFixed(2) ctx.fillStyle = "#8b9aff" ctx.font = "600 14px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.fillText(`Área total utilizada: ${areaTotal} m² de ${AREA_MAXIMA} m²`, CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, 62) }, [distribucion]) return (
) } export default DistributionCanvas
